about_the_game:
Welcome to Zenatria, a vibrant world with wondrous sights. However, the forces of darkness have encroached on your homeland.

Work together with your allies referencing the traditional fantasy archetypes. Guide our heroes and show them where to defend and utilize your strategic skills to keep the people of this world safe.


  • Development:

    We plan on releasing updates every year with new enemies, features, and gameplay.

  • Environments:

    Play within dynamic and exciting environments that will test your strategy to overcome obstacles.

  • Enemies:

    Defend against slimes, goblins, dragons and many more influenced by fantasy culture and storytelling.

  • Towers:

    Place towers that are inspired from well known fantasy archetypes to help keep the town safe.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Zenatria, a vibrant world with wondrous sights. However, the forces of darkness have encroached on your homeland.

Work together with your allies referencing the traditional fantasy archetypes. Guide our heroes and show them where to defend and utilize your strategic skills to keep the people of this world safe.


  • Development:

    We plan on releasing updates every year with new enemies, features, and gameplay.

  • Environments:

    Play within dynamic and exciting environments that will test your strategy to overcome obstacles.

  • Enemies:

    Defend against slimes, goblins, dragons and many more influenced by fantasy culture and storytelling.

  • Towers:

    Place towers that are inspired from well known fantasy archetypes to help keep the town safe.
name: Zenatria

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 4192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: It's time to answer the call, go into battle against the forces of Yurmim to defend the town from the onslaught of enemies.
